item.title: Julia Roberts' New Movie May Just Be Her Best Chance To Break A 24-Year Oscars Drought
item.description: Julia Roberts hasn't won anything at the Oscars for 24 long years, but thanks to her new movie, After the Hunt, that drought could finally be over.

item.title: Quentin Tarantino's 10-Movie Rule Ruined Once Upon A Time In Hollywood's True Sequel Plan
item.description: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood is getting a sequel not directed by Quentin Tarantino, and it's all thanks to his self-imposed 10-movie rule.

item.title: 10 Best Movies To Watch If You Like Stanley Kubrick's The Shining
item.description: From Hereditary to Possession, there are plenty of great horror movies out there that fans of Stanley Kubrick's The Shining need to check out.

item.title: Young Thug in the Clear, Judge Declines to Revoke Probation
item.description: Young Thug is not going back to jail ... the judge says his repost revealing the identity of a cop testifying in a murder trial did not violate his pr...

item.title: Wendy Williams Adds Attorney Joe Tacopina to Her Legal Team
item.description: Wendy Williams has a new legal mind on her side ... 'cause famed attorney Joe Tacopina says he's serving as her personal attorney. Tacopina -- who has...
